TestCaseMetaData.name: Smoke Test
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The initial Laboratory Test Compendium is delivered electronically from the LIS to the EHR-S. The EHR-S will integrate the eDOS into its test directory and use it to allow placement of orders electronically. The initial laboratory test compendium is composed of up to four messages.
TestCaseMetaData.PostCondition: Data elements are incorporated appropriately into the EHR-S.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate capability to support minimally populated messages (single occurrences of all required ("R") elements).
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: This is the initial "smoke testing" to reveal simple failures severe enough to preclude further testing.
